derivation: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of going round for inspection);
outline:
1. to see, behold, observe, regard
    1. (Qal)
      1. to behold, observe
      2. to regard
      3. to watch, watch (stealthily), lie in wait
kjv_def: behold, lay wait, look, observe, perceive, regard, see.
strongs_def: to spy out, i.e. (generally) survey, (for evil) lurk for, (for good) care for
